channel.title: Compiling issue
channel.description:
[code=c].\client.java:18535: illegal start of expression if(objectID == 4493){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ ; ^ .\client.java:18535: ';' expected if(objectID == 4493){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ ; ^ .\client.java:18538: 'else' without 'if' } else ^ .\client.java:18541: illegal start of expression if(objectID == 4495){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 75){ ; ^ .\client.java:18541: ';' expected if(objectID == 4495){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 75){ ; ^ .\client.java:18544: 'else' without 'if' } else ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What did i do wrong?

item.title: Compiling issue
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , now i get 3 errors with this code

} if(objectID == 4493){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ triggerTele(3413, 3538, 1); sM("@gre@Slayer Tower's 2nd Floor."); } else sM("You need at least 45 slayer to climb there!");

Error:

.\client.java:18539: illegal start of expression if(objectID == 4493){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ ^ .\client.java:18539: ';' expected if(objectID == 4493){ && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ ^ .\client.java:18542: 'else' without 'if' } else ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Someone plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling issue
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

}
if(objectID == 4493) && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){
triggerTele(3413, 3538, 1);
sM("@gre@Slayer Tower's 2nd Floor.");
} else {
sM("You need at least 45 slayer to climb there!");
}

i have put the sM in between brackets too

this is the first error from the 100 error’s error.

what could this mean? eventho the code is right , it still says im missing a bracket

} if(objectID == 4493) && (playerLevel[18] >= 45){ triggerTele(3413, 3538, 1); sM("@gre@Slayer Tower's 2nd Floor."); } else sM("You need at least 45 slayer to climb there!");
